naslov: Kuća: Stomorska, Villa 200 m2, POGLED, 50 m do MORA (prodaja)
opis: Prodajemo villu u izgradnji na odličnoj lokaciji u Stomorskoj, vanjska strana otoka Šolte s pogledom prema Splitu koji se ne može zakloniti, 50 m od mora ( put i stepenice ). U naravi radi se o izgradnji ville s bazenom, ključ u ruke po visokim standardima gradnje, što znači potpuno kvalitetno unutarnje uređenje objekta, okućnice s ogradnim zidovima, bazena s svom tehnikom, grijanje-hlađenje kuće sistemom dizalica topline itd. Znači uređenje svega do detalja, osim samog namještaja. Parcela je površine 300 m2. Ishođene sve dozvole za građenje, prijavljeno gradilište i započeta gradnja. Slike su animacija iz projekta. Moguće sudjelovanje kupca u odabiru dekorativnih izvedbenih radova. Prodavatelj se obvezuje gradnju završiti do kraja 2025.g., te potom ishoditi "uporabnu dozvolu". Agencijska provizija 3% We are selling a villa under construction in an excellent location in Stomorska, on the outer side of the island of Šolta, with an unobstructed view of Split, just 50 meters from the sea (via a road and stairs). The property is designed as a villa with a pool, delivered as a turnkey project with high construction standards, meaning the interior will be fully finished to a high quality, including the landscaping with boundary walls, the pool with all necessary equipment, and heating and cooling systems via heat pumps, etc. Everything will be completed to the finest details, except for the furniture. The plot size is 300 m². All building permits have been obtained, the construction site has been registered, and the construction has already begun. The images are project renderings. The buyer may participate in selecting decorative finishes. The seller commits to completing the construction by the end of the 2025 and obtaining the "usage permit" thereafter. Agency fee 3%
